title: Timeismoney怎么建取款机？
author: ctlee61
txt_content: 我弄了半天还是没弄出来。是合成还是搭建？那些东西怎么弄？PS：我说的是 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=26104

replies.txt_content:
